data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Zulia with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zulia, Venezuela

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Zulia, Venezuela to the gospel today.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 450,396 believers in Zulia, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Zulia, Venezuela be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Zulia, Venezuela. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Zulia, Venezuela to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,254,004 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Zulia, Venezuela has a population of 3,704,400.

We estimate Zulia has 450,396 people who might know Jesus, 2,609,716 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 644,288 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Zulia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
